title: Payment Failed on Checkout
description: Customer attempted to purchase item X but the payment failed with error code '403-DENIED'. Confirmed card details are correct.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: Requesting a persistent dark mode option for the entire application interface to improve usability at night.

title: Slow Loading Times on Dashboard
description: Dashboard takes over 15 seconds to load after login, regardless of browser or device. Started noticing this issue yesterday.

title: Subscription Cancelation Error
description: Attempted to cancel recurring subscription via the 'Manage Account' page but received an 'Unknown Error' message. Needs manual intervention.

title: Incorrect Invoice Amount
description: The latest monthly invoice (#INV-987) shows a charge of $99.99, but the customer's plan is only $49.99.

title: Missing Documentation for API Endpoint /v2/data
description: The new API endpoint for retrieving user data does not have corresponding documentation or examples in the developer portal.

title: Mobile App Crashes on Android 14
description: The application consistently crashes immediately upon launch on all devices running the latest Android 14 OS. Urgent fix needed.

title: Request for Data Export
description: Customer requires a full CSV export of their historical usage data for the past 6 months.

title: UI Misalignment on Safari Browser
description: On Safari (version 17.2), the navigation bar overflows the container, causing visual artifacts. Works fine on Chrome/Firefox.

title: Account Reactivation Required
description: Previous account was deactivated due to non-payment. Customer has paid outstanding balance and requires immediate reactivation.

title: Broken Link in Email Notification
description: The 'Reset Password' link in the automated email notification leads to a 404 error page.

title: Suggestion: Add bulk editing capability
description: Users should be able to select multiple records and apply the same update/change in a single action.
